data.text: God is the only one who can give me peace in my inner being,
Only he is like an overhanging rock under which I can be safe [MET];
When will you, my enemies, stop attacking me [RHQ]?
My enemies plan to remove me from my important position so that people no longer honor me.
God is the only one who gives me peace in my inner being;
Only he is like an overhanging rock under which I can be safe [MET];
God is the one who saves me and honors me.
You my people, always trust in him.
People who are considered to be unimportant are as worthless/unreliable as a breath of air;
Do not trust in money gained by extorting it from others;
I have heard God say more than once that he is the one who really has power,
and that he is the one who faithfully loves us.
